short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy InspireHEP TexKeys to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When writing a paper in high energy physics the usual workflow for citing other publications is the following: You search the paper in InspireHEP, click on the LaTeX link and copy the TexKey into your document.

This little extension helps you to optimize this. It adds a button to each record in an InspireHEP search which allows you to directly copy the TexKey into the clipboard.
